caption: Table 1: Some algorithms taking the form (4)
description: This table lists three algorithms that can be written in the form of equation (4) from the paper.  It shows how different choices of the reweighting function ψ(u, v) lead to different algorithms.  Specifically, it shows how the choice of  ψ(u, v) results in Alternating minimization, reparameterized IRLS, and linear recursive feature machines.
